title: My Crypto Loss: High 7 Figures Since 2013 #shorts
transcript: You know, my biggest loss in in crypto since 2013 was in high seven figures. Like it's below 10 million, but very very close to that. So, you know, did I lose years getting back? I didn't lose years. It was just, you know, part of the journey. Hopefully, you get to a higher low in your net worth. But even if you get to a lower lower low, which some people do, it's just a journey, man. You get it back, you're going to see something else that that you want to strive for. Money is obviously super important. I'm not saying it's not important but uh there are also many issues it doesn't solve.

title: Bitcoin Bounce: Euphoria vs. Reality - Will it Crash Again? #shorts
transcript: Bitcoin is having quite a bounce. If you look at altcoins, you look at XRP, you look at ETH, you look at Solana, all of the different cryptocurrencies have a nice bounce. Basically, Bitcoin bottomed out here a few days ago at 60. Now, it's back to 69. And of course, this brings a bit of positivity, a bit of euphoria to the crypto space. However, I have to warn you guys that many people are going to get so wrecked because of this bounce. You see, when you have a big crash, it's very normal to have a big bounce. However, if you look at the candle, it's still freaking red. I mean, the week started at 76 and went all the way to 60. Yes, now we're at 69, but you have to be still super conservative here. Next week is going to be quite critical because if we see next week a big green candle, let's say we see next week a green candle that erases all of the losses from this week, then we can speak about some kind of V-shaped recovery.
